relation: Great for these types of students
Campus police are constantly patrolling the campus and the campus has several call boxes
Students who do not like the big university feel, some classes are big but not as big as a huge university
Macon State is comparatively cheap for an excellent degree
The student life offers several trips and activities to do, also plenty to do in Macon, GA
Not a lot of choices at Macon State.
Macon State is new to Dorm life. The Dorms are like apartments and offer a great deal of security
Macon State offers a challenging honors program.
I would research what major you would like to pursue so you don't take any classes you don't need. I would also research the professors before stepping into their classes
Macon State is not your ordinary college. They have several majors, and classes that can work towards your schedule. Macon State offers rigorous classes to challenge students

Go Knights!, 185226=Cochran campus food was decent but this was back in 2002 when I was there. I cant speak for now. textAfterTable: Bang for the buck The tuition is great here. The financial aid can help you with any problems you may have. Emergency loans are given if you do not have the money right away. Am enjoying being here Everyone in Macon State are friendly and they give you tips on what classes you should take for your profession. I live in the Residence Life and it is wonderful. Other colleges have freshman sleeping in traditional dorms, but in Macon State you can live in a apartment. I have my own room and bathroom it is a great place to live in. Am learning a lot Professors are very helpful. If I am having trouble in a class, I can get a tutor or talk with my professor during their office hours. The professors want people to be successful and they want students to reach their goals. Login to rate or flag the reviews Sarah from Forsyth, GA 03/25/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful.
